alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:52AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact both the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could be moderate at times, with snowfall rates approaching 1 inch per hour. The heaviest snow will be west of US Route 11.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
